translation.en: [woman] "Do you believe in love at first sight?"
translation.de: EMMA GALE VERLIEBT SICH EMMA EROBERT MANHATTAN "Glauben Sie an Liebe auf den ersten Blick?

translation.en: "Me neither."
Those were the words that started the whole Emma Gale success story.
translation.de: Mit diesen Worten begann die Erfolgsgeschichte von Emma Gale.

translation.en: And for 20 years and 12 novels, it seemed like nothing could go wrong.
translation.de: Und 20 Jahre und 12 Romane lang schien nichts schiefgehen zu können.

translation.en: Until now.
[assistant] Hello, Ms. Brown. Welcome to The Drew Barrymore Show. Thank you.
Can't I just go home and wait until this blows over?
translation.de: Kann ich nicht einfach zu Hause warten, bis alles vorbei ist?

translation.en: This is not blowing over. This is a Category 5.
translation.de: Das geht nicht vorbei. Das ist Alarmstufe Rot.

translation.en: Do you know how many people hate you because of this book?
translation.de: Weißt du, wie viele dich für dieses Buch hassen?

translation.en: A lot?
It's showtime.
-I thought you were my friend. -Well, right now, I'm your agent.
translation.de: -Du warst mal meine Freundin. -Jetzt bin ich deine Agentin.

translation.en: So go out there and charm everybody's pants off.
translation.de: Also geh raus und bezirze sie alle.

translation.en: And try not to look so tall.
It's intimidating.
I suppose it's possible you might not have read a Sophie Brown novel,
translation.de: Vielleicht haben Sie noch keinen Roman von Sophie Brown gelesen,

translation.en: but trust me, you know somebody who has,
translation.de: aber garantiert jemand, den Sie kennen.

translation.en: and, boy, do I have some questions for her.
translation.de: Und ich habe jede Menge Fragen an sie.

translation.en: [man] Hm. Join us in welcoming back my good friend and best-selling author, Sophie Brown!
translation.de: Begrüßen wir meine gute Freundin und Bestsellerautorin Sophie Brown!

translation.en: Thank you. Oh, thank you.
-Hi. -Hi.
Thank you for having me. I'm surprised I made it in alive.
translation.de: Danke für die Einladung. Ich bin lebendig reingekommen.

translation.en: [chuckles] I barely did.
All of you viewers, if you wonder what we're talking about,
translation.de: Falls sich jemand fragt, wovon wir reden:

translation.en: I'd say that Sophie Brown has a whole lot of unhappy fans out there.
translation.de: Sophie Brown hat da draußen sehr viele unglückliche Fans.

translation.en: Well, I think you might mean former fans.
Well, I guess we're all wondering about the ending of your latest book.
translation.de: Ich denke, wir alle rätseln über den Schluss deines letzten Buchs.

translation.en: I know that the character of Winston charmed many of the readers.
translation.de: Ich weiß, dass Winston viele Fans hatte.

translation.en: Then why in the world would you kill him?
translation.de: Und warum lässt du ihn dann sterben?

translation.en: -The readers, they loved Winston. -[audience clapping]
Maybe they just didn't know him like I did.
translation.de: Vielleicht kannten sie ihn nicht so gut wie ich.

translation.en: We don't always get the happy ending.
translation.de: Es gibt nicht immer ein Happy End.

translation.en: You know, I normally don't do this,
but I have got to agree with the fans out there.
translation.de: aber ich muss den Fans zustimmen.

translation.en: He didn't deserve to fall down the stairs.
translation.de: Er hat es nicht verdient, die Treppe runterzufallen.

translation.en: So you're on their side?
Well, you murdered a man that I was in love with.
translation.de: Du hast einen Mann ermordet, in den ich verliebt war.

translation.en: I mean, what gives you the right to take him away?
translation.de: Mit welchem Recht nimmst du ihn uns?

translation.en: Well, I'm… I'm the author.
I know, but perhaps you're having a hard time
translation.de: Schon, aber vielleicht fällt es dir schwer,

translation.en: separating your real life from the fiction in your books.
translation.de: in deinen Büchern dein wahres Leben von der Fiktion zu trennen.

translation.en: -What? -[Drew] Well, you've had a rough year.
Your husband left you. You had a very messy divorce.
translation.de: Dein Mann hat dich verlassen. Dann diese Scheidung.

translation.en: Okay, but Winston is a fictional character.
translation.de: Aber Winston ist eine fiktive Figur.

translation.en: -Was he? -Yes.
And you should be happy that it was a quick death, yeah,
translation.de: Seid froh, dass er schnell starb.

translation.en: because I could have extended it for ten pages.
translation.de: Es hätte zehn Seiten dauern können.

translation.en: I could have dragged him behind a car. I could have poisoned him with mercury.
translation.de: Ich hätte ihn hinterm Auto herschleifen oder mit Quecksilber vergiften können.

translation.en: I could have chopped him into little, teeny pieces and fed him to the sharks!
translation.de: Ich hätte ihn in kleine Stücke zerhackt an Haie verfüttern können!

translation.en: -[TV show theme music playing] -We'll be right back.
I became a writer so I could write in my pajamas, not so I could get yelled at by strangers.
translation.de: Ich wurde Autorin, um daheim zu arbeiten, nicht, damit Leute mich anbrüllen.

translation.en: I thought you became a writer because of Grandpa.
translation.de: Wurdest du nicht Autorin wegen Opa,

translation.en: You used to sit in the barbershop and listen to his stories, right?
translation.de: der dir im Friseursalon Geschichten erzählte?

translation.en: Yeah.
About the castle.
-About Scotland. -Mm.
He had told me that he snuck in once. [chuckles]
translation.de: Er sagte, er habe sich hineingeschlichen.

translation.en: Yep.
He told that one a lot.
Are you sure you're gonna be okay? 'Cause I can come back next weekend.
translation.de: Ist wirklich alles okay? Ich komme gern am Wochenende.

translation.en: Absolutely not. You stay at school. Don't worry about me. I got this.
translation.de: Nein. Du bleibst im College. Keine Sorge, ich komme klar.

translation.en: [Sophie] I need to forget about the Emma Gale fiasco for a while.
translation.de: Ich muss dieses Fiasko eine Weile vergessen.

translation.en: [Sophie] I need to go away.
The castle.
I'll go to Scotland.
It's hidden away, and it's quiet, and nobody knows me there.
translation.de: Das ist weit weg und ruhig, und niemand kennt mich dort.

translation.en: Mom, this is great. You're finally taking a vacation.
translation.de: Mom, das ist toll. Endlich machst du Urlaub.

translation.en: Not a vacation.
A working trip.
Just until the bad press dies down.
I can write the new Emma Gale,
translation.de: Ich schreibe den neuen Emma Gale,

translation.en: bring Winston back, and everything will be back to normal.
translation.de: hole Winston zurück, und alles normalisiert sich wieder.

translation.en: All right, well, at least promise me you'll see the castle.
translation.de: Na gut. Versprich, dir wenigstens das Schloss anzusehen.

translation.en: I promise.
That's me.
Ah, you're American.
Yes.
[in Scottish accent] Nobody told me that.
Whereabouts?
[in Scottish accent] Where are you from?
[in English] No. No.
This is all the luggage I have.
-[in Scottish accent] It's not a problem. -Oh. Thank you.
♪ Sometimes we get away with it ♪ ♪ Sometimes we get burned… ♪
♪ Sometimes we can just learn from it ♪
translation.de: GEMÜTLICHE BETTEN, SCHOTTISCHES FRÜHSTÜCK, ORTSKUNDE TOLLES ESSEN, GASTFREUNDSCHAFT

translation.en: ♪ Or we just get burned ♪
-Hamish, no! Hamish, stop! -[Sophie gasps]
Well, I'm glad you were… here.
He, uh… [chuckles] …doesn't usually like strangers.
-[dog barks] -Neither do you, ya dobber.
Thank you.
Enjoy your stay, then.
[Sophie] Hey. Are you the welcoming committee?
Oh, hi. May I help you?
I'm checking in. Very good. Follow me.
Isn't that Sophie Brown?
In our wee village? Dinna be daft.
translation.de: In unserem Dorf? Sei nicht albern.

translation.en: -Welcome to the village inn. -Thank you.
I have a reservation under Sophie Brown.
Sophie Brown, the author?
Not sure I should admit it, but, uh, yes. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob ich es zugeben soll, aber ja.

translation.en: I've read all your books. [chuckles] I just finished the last one.
translation.de: Ich hab Ihre Bücher gelesen, das letzte gerade erst.

translation.en: Wonderful.
-May I ask you a question, then? -Sure.
Why'd you leave it so long to kill off Winston?
translation.de: Warum ließen Sie Winston erst jetzt sterben?

translation.en: -What? -I was hoping you'd do it in volume one.
I never liked that sod. Too bloody perfect.
translation.de: Ich mochte den Idioten nie. Viel zu perfekt.

translation.en: You know what? I'm not so sure I did either.
translation.de: Wissen Sie was? Vielleicht mochte ich ihn auch nie.

translation.en: -Bugger. -[Sophie] Bugger.
-[chuckles] I killed him off. -Good for you, Sophie Brown. [laughs]
[Sophie] Sod. Got any other names for him?
translation.de: Idiot. Wie kann man ihn noch nennen?

translation.en: Oh, it's lovely.
That's very kind. I'm sure it's not what you're used to.
translation.de: Vielen Dank. Sie sind sicher anderes gewohnt.

translation.en: Actually… [chuckles]
…it is exactly what I was hoping for.
translation.de: genau so etwas hatte ich mir erhofft.

translation.en: Is Dun Dunbar Castle nearby? [woman] Aye, it's just over the hill.
translation.de: -Ist Dun Dunbar Castle in der Nähe? -Gleich hinter dem Hügel.

translation.en: Well, if you need anything else, Ms. Brown, just ring.
translation.de: Wenn Sie noch was brauchen, rufen Sie, Ms Brown.

translation.en: Thank you. And it's Sophie.
Nice to meet you, Maisie. You too.
[agent] Scotland? Really? Why didn't you clear this with me first?
translation.de: Schottland? Warum hast du das nicht mit mir besprochen?

translation.en: Because you would have talked me out of it.
-How long have we known each other? -Too long.
translation.de: -Wie lange kennen wir uns schon? -Zu lange.

translation.en: Since page one, book four. And when have I ever steered you wrong?
translation.de: Seit Seite eins, Band 4. Und wann war ein Rat von mir je falsch?

translation.en: -The title of book six. -Oh, aside from that!
Don't worry. I'm here to write.
Good, and when can I expect to see pages?
translation.de: Gut. Wann bekomme ich was zu sehen?

translation.en: Soon. It's practically writing itself.
translation.de: Bald. Es schreibt sich praktisch von alleine.

translation.en: -Goodbye. -Bye. [blows kisses]
Right, now, the gift shop is right here.
-[man 1] No, thank you. -[woman 1 sighs]
Uh, no, you've missed the… the gift shop.
No? Well, surely you don't wanna leave without a souvenir.
translation.de: Nein? Sie wollen doch nicht ohne ein Souvenir gehen.

translation.en: [woman 2] No, thank you.
Kilts, tea towels, coasters? All with the clan coat of arms, of course.
translation.de: Kilts, Geschirrtücher, Untersetzer? Natürlich alles mit dem Clan-Wappen.

translation.en: But of course.
Well, may your travels be swift.
translation.de: Nun, ich wünsche eine zügige Reise.

translation.en: Something on your mind?
Several things.
[guide] Aye, well, perhaps one of them could be fixing the door to the library.
translation.de: Eines davon könnte die Reparatur der Tür zur Bibliothek sein.

translation.en: -It's hard to get the people in. -Aye, it's even harder to get them out.
translation.de: -Die Leute kommen schwer hinein. -Sie rauszubekommen, ist schwerer.

translation.en: Hello there.
Hi.
-So you work here too? -Wherever they'll have me.
translation.de: -Sie arbeiten auch hier? -Wo immer man mich will.

translation.en: You just missed the tour, but the next one's Thursday.
translation.de: Die nächste Führung ist am Donnerstag.

translation.en: Oh, well, um, could I just wander around a little on my own?
translation.de: Könnte ich ein bisschen allein herumlaufen?

translation.en: [laughs] I'm afraid that's not--
It's all right, Thomas. I'll give her a tour.
translation.de: Schon gut, Thomas. Ich gebe ihr eine Führung.

translation.en: -I wouldn't want to get you in trouble. -Take my chances.
translation.de: -Ich will nicht, dass Sie Ärger kriegen. -Das riskiere ich.

translation.en: This way.
[man] There are more than 3,000 castles in Scotland.
translation.de: In Schottland gibt es mehr als 3000 Schlösser.

translation.en: Some date back to the 14th century.
These grand old ladies hold the proud history of all those who lived, worked, and fought here.
translation.de: Sie erzählen die stolze Geschichte aller, die hier lebten, arbeiteten und kämpften.

translation.en: Look at that staircase.
Aye, it's one of five.
What's up there?
Upper floors.
This here is the music room
where the third duchess wrote a book of poems.
translation.de: wo die dritte Herzogin Gedichte schrieb.

translation.en: -Have you read it? -Aye, and I wouldn't recommend it.
translation.de: -Haben Sie sie gelesen? -Ja, nicht zu empfehlen.

translation.en: -So you're here for the day, then? -A little longer.
translation.de: -Sie sind den ganzen Tag hier? -Noch etwas länger.

translation.en: Aye. Tourists don't usually stay in our village. We're more of what you call a drive-through.
translation.de: Touristen bleiben normalerweise nicht. Wir sind eher ein Drive-Through.

translation.en: Dun Dunbar was built by the first Duke of Dunbar for his wife.
translation.de: Der erste Herzog von Dunbar errichtete Dun Dunbar für seine Frau.

translation.en: Been in the same family for 500 years.
translation.de: Es gehörte seit 500 Jahren derselben Familie.

translation.en: -Who owns it now? -Just some royal arse.
-[dog collar clinking] -Hamish! Hamish. -[Sophie] Oh my goodness. Oh! -[Hamish whimpers]
-No! No! -Okay. Hi.
Never seen him like this. Have you meat in your pocket?
translation.de: Das tut er nie. Haben Sie Fleisch dabei?

translation.en: I always carry a steak on my person. [laughs]
translation.de: Ich habe immer ein Steak dabei.

translation.en: Out now. Go on. Get out. Go on!
translation.de: Raus jetzt. Los. Raus hier. Los!

translation.en: I'm sorry.
It's okay.
So, this is the older part of the castle.
translation.de: Dies ist der ältere Teil des Schlosses.

translation.en: Dates back to 1500.
The Dunbars had meetings of the clan and grand celebrations in here.
translation.de: Hier fanden Treffen des Dunbar-Clans und große Feste statt.

translation.en: Come on. There's more.
This staircase was built clockwise.
Apparently, the best way to defend by a right-handed swordsman.
translation.de: Um von einem Rechtshänder verteidigt zu werden.

translation.en: What's up at the top?
Twelve bedrooms and ten bathrooms.
I guess the, uh, royal arse needs a lot of thrones.
translation.de: Der adlige Arsch braucht wohl viele Throne.

translation.en: Never enough.
-Can we go up? -Sorry, not part of the tour.
translation.de: -Gehen wir hoch? -Das gehört nicht zur Führung.

translation.en: Can I steal you away from the tour for a moment? Can it wait?
translation.de: -Kann ich dich kurz entführen? -Kann das warten?

translation.en: There's a couple wanting to talk about a wedding. All right. How do they look?
translation.de: -Da ist ein Paar wegen einer Hochzeit. -Wie sehen sie aus?

translation.en: -Like they can afford it. -Stay put.
I won't be long.
Top of the circular…
…staircase…
…there's
a hallway.
At the top of the stairs, there are three doors.
translation.de: Am Ende der Treppe sind drei Türen.

translation.en: One, two, three.
[man] Hello?
Hello?
Hello?
translation.de: LEXI! SIEH MAL! ICH HAB SEINEN NAMEN GEFUNDEN!

translation.en: -[door opens] -Hello, miss?
translation.de: ICH HAB SEINEN NAMEN GEFUNDEN! Hallo, Miss.

translation.en: Miss?
-What are you doing? -I'm sorry.
I just needed to see something.
And what could you possibly need to see up here?
translation.de: Was müssen Sie hier oben sehen?

translation.en: Okay, the thing is, I have a little family history in this place.
translation.de: Meine Familiengeschichte ist mit diesem Ort verbunden.

translation.en: -Oh, do you now? -Yes.
Don't tell me. You did a DNA test, and your ancestor's Mary Queen of Scots?
translation.de: Hat ein DNA-Test Sie zur Nachfahrin von Maria Stuart erklärt?

translation.en: I said I was sorry.
Do you know why no one's allowed up here?
translation.de: Warum darf wohl keiner hier hoch?

translation.en: I'm guessing frostbite. Because it's someone's home.
How would you like a parade of gawkers traipsing through yours?
translation.de: Möchten Sie Gaffer in Ihrer Wohnung?

translation.en: Tour's over.
Uh, that'll be £20.
[scoffs] The sign says ten. Private tour's more.
Ah, I dinna have change.
Well, consider it a tip for your warmth and hospitality.
translation.de: Sehen Sie es als Trinkgeld für die Gastfreundschaft.

translation.en: Well, here's a tip for you.
Stay out of places you don't belong.
translation.de: Bleiben Sie fern von Orten, wo Sie nicht hingehören.

translation.en: Keep him away from people. Right. Well, we try.
translation.de: -Halten Sie ihn von Menschen fern. -Ja. Wir versuchen es.

translation.en: What was all that about?
Book the wedding.
-[woman 1] I would love to see you dance. -[woman 2] Well, those were the days.
translation.de: -Ich sähe dich gerne mal tanzen. -So war das damals.

translation.en: -[woman 1] Go on, then. Give us a show. -[woman 2 laughs]
translation.de: Na los. Tanz uns was vor.

translation.en: -[Maisie] Oh, I'd like to see that. -Hi.
-Enjoy the castle? -I did, yes. It was magical.
translation.de: -Hat Ihnen das Schloss gefallen? -Ja. Es war zauberhaft.

translation.en: I love your books.
-I rather love them too. -We've read every one.
-I told them not to bother you. -[Sophie] Are you kidding?
translation.de: -Ich bat sie, Sie in Ruhe zu lassen. -Was?

translation.en: You may be the only readers left who don't hate me.
translation.de: Sie sind die einzigen Leser, die mich nicht hassen.

translation.en: So, knitting in a pub?
Do you knit?
Oh, no. I mean, I've always wanted to learn, but…
translation.de: Nein. Ich wollte es immer lernen, aber…

translation.en: Oh! Well, these might come in handy.
Then you can join our club.
translation.de: Dann kannst du bei uns mitmachen.

translation.en: Thank you. Um…
I'm Sophie.
I'm Rhona.
I'm a pastry chef, but for now, I make biscuits in the bakery across the way.
translation.de: Ich bin Konditorin, aber vorerst backe ich Kekse in der Bäckerei gegenüber.

translation.en: Thank you. [chuckles]
These are… [chuckles] …delicious!
And this is Angus.
His husband was one of the original members, but he passed on.
translation.de: Sein Mann war in unserem Club, aber er starb.

translation.en: Not long after, Angus showed up. Hasn't stopped knitting since.
translation.de: Kurz darauf kam Angus zu uns. Seitdem strickt er ständig.

translation.en: Here, would you like me to show you how to knit?
translation.de: Soll ich dir das Stricken beibringen?

translation.en: [Sophie] Yes, please.
Well, come on, then.
-Not letting this go though. -[Helen] No.
[Sophie] That is my daughter, Lexi.
She's away at college now.
-Oh, it's hard when they move away. -It's harder when they move back in.
And your husband?
Uh, it's been a year since my divorce.
translation.de: Ich bin seit einem Jahr geschieden.

translation.en: -Oh. -It's been four since mine.
I've got a boyfriend in the bakery.
translation.de: Ich habe einen Freund, in der Bäckerei.

translation.en: -He just doesn't know it yet! -I'm still married.
translation.de: -Er weiß es noch nicht! -Ich bin noch verheiratet.

translation.en: Although, I'm not sure he knows it either.
translation.de: Aber er weiß es wohl auch nicht.

translation.en: -[Sophie laughs] -Not true. You two are madly in love. We are.
It's nice to hear him laugh like that. He hasn't spoken a word since Graham died.
translation.de: Wie schön, dass er wieder lacht. Er sprach kein Wort seit Grahams Tod.

translation.en: [Rhona] I still can't believe you chose our little village to write the next Emma Gale!
translation.de: Unglaublich, dass du dein nächstes Buch in unserem Dorf schreiben willst!

translation.en: Well, I was supposed to come here a long time ago with my dad.
translation.de: Ich wollte vor langer Zeit mit meinem Vater herkommen.

translation.en: But he got sick, and we never made it.
translation.de: Aber er wurde krank, und wir schafften es nie.

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
He lived at Dunbar Castle as a kid.
translation.de: Er lebte als Kind in Dunbar Castle.

translation.en: Well, outside the castle. They weren't allowed inside.
-His family, they were the groundskeepers. -You mean your family?
My family. The McGuintys.
Ah, you're one of us, then. [chuckles]
translation.de: Du bist also eine von uns.

translation.en: McGuinty. I… I don't think I've heard that name around here.
translation.de: Den Namen McGuinty habe ich hier nie gehört.

translation.en: Well, they moved to New York when he was a boy.
I was at school with a McGuinty back in the day.
translation.de: Ich war damals mit einem McGuinty in der Schule.

translation.en: A real talker, that one.
Always blethering and telling the tales.
-[Helen chuckles] -Callum McGuinty?
That's him.
Of course, we called him something else.
translation.de: Auch wenn wir ihn anders nannten.

translation.en: McMotormouth.
[Helen] Oh, you have his smile.
[sobs] Oh, I don't know why I'm crying.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, warum ich weine.

translation.en: Because these are your roots, dear.
I wish I'd come back sooner. -Well, you're here now. -[Helen] Mm-hmm.
translation.de: -Ich wünschte, ich wäre eher gekommen. -Jetzt bist du hier.

translation.en: And you got to see Dun Dunbar while it's still a castle.
translation.de: Und hast Dun Dunbar noch als Schloss gesehen.

translation.en: -What do you mean? -It's… it's up for sale.
A lot of the old castles are for sale.
Aberdeenshire's cheaper than a Range Rover.
translation.de: Aberdeenshire ist günstiger als ein Range Rover.

translation.en: And you'd be more comfortable living in a Range Rover.
translation.de: Im Range Rover wohnst du bequemer.

translation.en: -[Helen] Oh, Angus. -[Sophie] Wow. Thank you.
[Helen] That's great.
[man] So someone wants a trophy castle?
translation.de: Jemand will sich also mit einem Schloss schmücken?

translation.en: I didn't get that feeling.
It's worse, then. They wanna tear it down for condos and a golf course.
translation.de: Noch schlimmer. Sie reißen es ab für Luxuswohnungen und einen Golfplatz.

translation.en: Here's the offer.
And it's rather large.
I'm doing the tours and the gift shop.
translation.de: Ich mache die Führungen und den Souvenirladen,

translation.en: I've agreed to the weddings and… and maybe even a funeral or two.
translation.de: Hochzeiten, vielleicht sogar ein, zwei Beerdigungen.

translation.en: Maybe your own.
Look, we've been mates for a long time.
I've bent over backwards, keeping you out of foreclosure.
translation.de: Ich tat alles gegen eine Zwangsvollstreckung.

translation.en: I just need a little more time, Ian.
translation.de: Ich brauche nur mehr Zeit, Ian.

translation.en: There is no more time unless you sell off the farmlands.
translation.de: Es bleibt keine mehr, es sei denn, du verkaufst die Ländereien.

translation.en: No, I can't do that.
-Myles-- -No, it's out of the question!
Uh, Ms. Brown has arrived.
-Sophie Brown. Myles Dunbar. -You're the royal arse?
translation.de: -Sophie Brown. Myles Dunbar. -Sie sind der adelige Arsch?

translation.en: -You're the buyer? -He let me think he worked here.
translation.de: -Sie die Käuferin? -Er tat, als arbeite er hier.

translation.en: [Myles] It is work being me.
translation.de: Es ist Arbeit, ich zu sein.

translation.en: And you can't just show up and decide to buy a castle, like some hamburger.
translation.de: Und man kauft ein Schloss nicht einfach wie einen Hamburger.

translation.en: -Well, you did say it was a drive-through. -I'm not selling to her.
translation.de: -Wer sprach von Drive-Through? -Ich verkaufe nicht an sie.

translation.en: Mr. Dunbar.
Technically it's "Duke."
Uh, Myles is the 12th Duke of Dunbar.
translation.de: Myles ist der zwölfte Herzog von Dunbar.

translation.en: Oh, well, forgive me, Your Highness.
Technically, it's "Your Grace."
I can think of a few other names I'd call you.
translation.de: Mir fallen ein paar andere Bezeichnungen ein.

translation.en: And you wouldn't be the first.
And FYI,
the title does not come with the land.
translation.de: der Titel wird nicht mit veräußert.

translation.en: So if that's what you're after, you can buy a ladyship online for £30.
translation.de: Wenn Sie einen wollen, kaufen Sie ihn sich online für 30 Pfund.

translation.en: The only title I'm interested in is my next book,
translation.de: Mich interessiert nur der Titel meines nächsten Buchs,

translation.en: which I'm going to write at Dun Dunbar in the library.
translation.de: das ich in der Schlossbibliothek schreiben werde.

translation.en: I'm not giving up 500 years of history on someone's whim.
